ovdesc.p: The purpose of this table is to list out all the accounts that are attached to the portfolio which is going to be closed.

desc.p: Identifies the Customer's Account(s), that are attached to the portfolio.
1-16 numeric character Account number or 3-10 character Mnemonic Account id (uppercase alpha or numeric or ".").
Must be a valid Account on the ACCOUNT file.
Identifies the Security Account of the Customer.
Standard SEC.ACC.MASTER id ; 1-10 numeric character Customer id separated by "-" from 1-3 numeric character SEC.ACC.MASTER Id. (Mandatory input).
Must be an existing SEC.ACC.MASTER record.
